snippet.title: Picking Up The Pieces - Teaser Trailer (Windows/Mac)
snippet.description:
I thought I understood my brain better than this.

But now I feel like I never did.

Picking up the pieces is an experimental game about digging through thoughts and striving to feel good enough when you feel alone. Explore a handful of levels with surreal visuals in this fully voiced adventure.

Available Now:
itch.io: https://cole-chittim.itch.io/pickingup
GameJolt: https://gamejolt.com/games/PickingUp/443883

Follow and connect with me:
Twitter: https://twitter.com/ColeChittim
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/ColeChittim?sub_confirmation=1
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/cole.chittim/

#indiegame  #walkingsimuator #pointnclick
